page.title: 09WALKING ON THE SOUTH DOWNS
page.content: IF YOU WALK ALONG THE SOUTH DOWNS IN JUNE YOU WILL SEE CROPS GROWING AND CATTLE GRAZING.YOU CAN WALK THROUGH THE CROPS ON FOOTPATHS AND THERE ARE BRIDLEWAYS FOR HORSES.THE FARMER HAS GATES TO KEEP HIS CATTLE FROM ESCAPING.YOU MUST SHUT THE GATES TO KEEP THE ANIMALS SAFE. { FARMING ON THE DOWNS INCLUDING {SHEEP,CATTLE, PIGS AND CEREAL CROPS } AS YOU WALK ACROSS THE DOWNS YOUR FEET WILL TOUCH CHALK AND FLINT. AROUND YOU WILL BE BRILLIANT POPPIES,ALONG THE FOOTPATHS,WILD ROSES IN THE HEDGES AND WILD ORCHIDS IN THE FIELDS. AS YOU GET NEAR THE TOP OF DITCHING BEACON YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE THE SEA IN ONE DIRECTION AND IN THE OTHER YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE THE FIELDS AND THE FORESTS AND FURTHER.
